forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind around 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 13 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon, Downtown San Francisco greets us with a sense of warmth despite the cooling temperatures that will gradually settle around 62 degrees as the sun arcs across the sky. The bright sunshine bathes the city, invigorating the streets with a lively energy that invites exploration and engagement. A brisk west wind, sweeping through at 22 mph, adds a refreshing edge to the air, while gusts may reach up to 28 mph, reminding us of the potency of the bay's coastal influences. While the horizon is largely clear, wisps of cloud venture in, softening the sharpness of the urban silhouette, hinting at an approaching marine layer.

Come nightfall, a cloak of mostly cloudy skies will embrace the city, with temperatures cooling to a gentle 54 degrees. The evening breeze will maintain its spirited character, with winds out of the west-southwest whispering softly at 13 to 23 mph. Dress lightly but do keep a light layer handy for those cooler moments, allowing for comfort as one meanders through the enigmatic streets, perhaps culminating the day with a leisurely dinner at a local eatery. Thus, the vibrant hues of the afternoon give way to a more subdued yet tranquil atmosphere as the city’s pulse slows, beckoning those who wish to savor the magic of a San Francisco night.
